|brand = Synology |model = DiskStation |submodelappend = yes |submodel = DS412+ |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS, NAS enclosure |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel Atom;D2700; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = x86-64 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 2.13 GHz<!-- undocumented --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;K9F1G08U0C; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SO-DIMM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth1chip = Intel;WG82574L; |eth2chip = Intel;WG82574L; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0, eSATA |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = 1 |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 8.33 |pwr_conn = <!-- Connector Type --> |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Link Aggregation |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/12/2012 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B007JLE84C |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *CPU: [[Intel Atom]] Dual Core 2.13 GHz *RAM Memory: 1GB DDR3 (SoDIMM). Compatible with SODIMM DDR3-1333 PC3-10600 CL9 timing of 9-9-9. Manually upgradeable e.g. to Kingston valueram KVR1333D3S8S9/2G. See https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xoBHXC_shHk *Drive Type: 3.5" SATA HDD, 2.5" SATA HDD, 2.5" SATA SSD *Max Internal Capacity: 16TB (4x 4TB HDD) *External HDD Interface: 2x USB 3.0, 1x USB 2.0, 1x eSATA *LAN: 2x GbE
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/nas/nas-reviews/31909-synology-ds412-diskstation-reviewed ''Synology DiskStation DS412+'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :CPU: [[Intel Atom]] D2700 @2.13GHz :Flash: 128MB DOM ([[Samsung]] K9F1G08U0C) ::''USBest'' UT165-L46 (Controller) :RAM: 1GB DDR3 SoDIMM (expandable to 3GB) :Southbridge: [[Intel]] 82801JIR (ICH10R) :eSATA: ''Silicon Image'' SiI3531 ::''Silicon Image'' SiI3132 PCIe (1x) (rear eSATA) :USB 3.0: 2x, [[NEC]] D720200AF (USB 3.0 Controller) :USB 2.0: 1x; I/O: ''ITE'' IT8728F :Ethernet: [[Intel]] WG82574L (2x) :uC: [[Microchip]] PIC16F883 (8-bit Microcontroller)
==See also== :[[List of NAS Devices]] *[[Synology DiskStation DS415+]] â€¢ [https://www.synology.com/en-global/products/DS415+ PPage] :ASIN: [http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00IKTSSIO?tag=wiki085-20 B00IKTSSIO] (02/21/2014) :CPU: [[Intel Atom]] C2538 Quad Core @2.4GHz <!-- ::(w/ AES-NI HW Encryption Engine) --> :Flash: 128MB (NAND); RAM Memory: 2GB (DDR3) :Drive Bays: 4x 3.5"/2.5" HDD/SSD (SATA) :External Ports: 1x USB 2.0, 2x USB 3.0, 1x eSATA Port :LAN: 2x GbE (w/ Failover and Link Aggregation Support)
